volop.name: Food Rescuer - Short Hills to East Orange/Essex County, NJ
volop.description:
Our volunteers recover healthy meals from commercial donor cafeterias and deliver them to specified nearby non-profit organizations. Every meal saved nourishes our community in need whilst also reducing the landfill waste and so helping the environment.

The volunteer role would involve:

  • picking up meals from our donor cafeteria, and
  • delivering these meals to our non-profit community partner/s in nearby area.

Each volunteer task will take approximately one hour including travel time between donor and recipient. Pick up and deliveries will be on a specified week day (not at weekends) and can be any time from morning to mid afternoon, depending on the donor requirements. Volunteers will need to drive their own car. We welcome regular participation but will work with your schedule.

We are looking for volunteers in Essex County to transport food from Short Hills to East Orange on Friday afternoons at 1:15 p.m.

address.full: 120 John Street, PRINCETON, New Jersey, US
50 Country Day Drive, Millburn, New Jersey, US

volop.commitmentDetails: Volunteer jobs usually take about 60 minutes but can be slighlty more depending on the assignment. We welcome regular participation but will work with your schedule.
volop.otherRequirements: Volunteers will need access to a car, a valid driver's license and adequate auto insurance. They will also need a smartphone and be comfortable lifting and carrying large bags containing several meal trays.
